metadata.Title: CVE-2020-11655 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description: SQLite through 3.31.1 allows attackers to cause a denial of service (segmentation fault) via a malformed window-function query because the AggInfo object's initialization is mishandled.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> per upstream bug, introduced in 3.25

criterions.comment: sqlite: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
